# huebnerMPr

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

R Package containing functions for cleaning and vizualizing mainly used in my master
project about energy efficient computation.

## Installation

You can install the development version of huebnerMPr from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("maxhuebner/huebnerMPr")
```
